scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary, crowned and seated on a golden crescent moon, holding the Christ Child. She is surrounded by a celestial host of blue-hued figures, possibly angels or souls, in a radiant blue sky. Below, a kneeling figure in a black habit, likely a monk or devotee, prays with clasped hands. The lower portion of the image shows a green, rolling landscape with scattered trees. The entire scene is framed by an ornate border with floral motifs.
